post.body: do you love babies when they sleep too? Sleep, btw, is apparently for the weak.
welcome to your latest addiction! and merry merry tonight and tomorrow
was just about to call you to see what you are doing for dins. Luckily, you live inside my head.
yay! I haven't watched that ep yet, but YAY! Liked her the best by far.
you still there?
love the emma
watching Love Actually. Scene with Emma Thompson in bedroom after figuring out husband is cheating? Oh sweet tears.
woke up kind of angry. 5 year old talking really loud in hallway woke up baby in crib who had a wakeful night. Can I restart today please?
had to cancel kids' party at my house due to the flu. But now am feeling better and have whole day ahead of me with baby. what to do?
oh, the flu for Christmas? Why THANK YOU Santa!
bag of peanuts is lunch, right?
wish I could call in a snow day.
how much coffee is too much? Like really, I need to know.
bite me, asshat. (btw, I love how brave I am posting this on Twitter instead of saying it to his face).
fighting with grumpy Matt. so grumpy, he is.
had an excellent early family xmas last night. I laughed so hard I peed my pants. my brothers are funny.
you know what's fun? Finding out you have a bug infestation in your cupboards the weekend before you host the family xmas party. FUN!
he better deliver
he even said he would fit it "up his ass" if I could get the wireless function to work. well twitters, you are now my witnesses to that
Matt just told me that if I could get the wireless printer to work, I could put it anywhere other than the f-ing dinner table
